name: La Sportiva Stride Hoodie - Men's
description:
Hold onto your hard-earned warmth during chilly fall bouldering sessions. Made from a warm fleece blend, the Stride hoodie takes the edge off fall days and layers well when the temperatures really drop.Soft polyester, cotton and bamboo fiber blend.Crisscross hood helps seal out brisk winds.Large kangaroo pocket is great for stashing your phone.Regular fit feels just right.

        Sustainability
